transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Namaste sir, mai Om baat kar raha hu aapka India Mart ka account se.
Customer: Ha account manager kitne ho aap manager hai isme India Mart me hamare.
Executive: Sir mai hi aapka account manager hu sir.
Customer: Kya pata badalte to bahut rehte hai na.
Executive: Ji sir pehle aapke jo the wo Sarthak Sharma ji the but sir unhone na kisi health issue ki wajah se unko dusre department me unhone pehle se chutti le li thi kafi din ki abhi unko dusre department me shift kar diya hai to us unki jagah abhi mai aapka account handle karta hu to usi ke regarding mere ko baat karni hai sir maine na aapko by lead ki beji thi sir aapko aapke whatsapp pe sir uske nahi janna cha raha tha ki wo relevant thi ya nahi thi sir but aapne sir call nahi uthaya and aap abhi bhi sir service use nahi kar rahe to mai bas ye puchna chahta tha sir kis tarike ka issue aa raha hai sir abhi hamare ko.
Customer: Abhi to sir issue hi pade hai bhaiya hamare paas order ek nahi aaya maine maine aapko bola tha mera number add kar dena mere paas abhi tak koi call aayi nahi sirf account manager ki aati hai wo bhi kabhi kabhar aur kisi ki koi call nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir aapka number isme add ho rakha hai.
Customer: Ho rakha hai to mere paas call to aani chahiye na sir usme na sir kya ho rakha hai usme aapka ek isme number add hai 98394 jo last me 394 se end ho raha hai.
Customer: Ha
Executive: And shuru me usme 98 hai wo sir wo dono time pe on ho rakha hai non office hours me bhi monday saturday aur holidays pe bhi aur office hours me bhi wo on ho rakha hai but aapka wala jo number hai na aur jo primary pe sir jo hai unka jo number hai wo number sirf office hours me on ho rakha hai 9 am to 7 pm monday to saturday uske alava wo number on nahi ho rakha sir usme calls nahi aayengi jo aapki mera mera ye number daliye na.
Executive: Ye wala number sir aapka dala hua hai sir.
Customer: Mere paas koi call nahi aayi kisi ki bhi.
Executive: Sir hum active hi nahi hai na ispe isi wajah se call nahi aa rahi koi bhi hamari listing hi kafi jyada down ho gayi hai isi ke liye to sir mai aapko keh raha tha ki mai aapko aapke whatsapp pe isi wale number pe aapko aapke whatsapp pe by lead mai share kar dunga usse kya hoga na mai aapko aap mere ko relevant bataiye sir aap hamare se relevant konsi by lead hai hame kis tarike ki hum all india deal karte hai sir.
Customer: Hum to only door frame hi bas manufacture hai window door frame.
Executive: Ji ji ji aur sir hum all india deal karte hai na.
Customer: Ha bilkul.
Executive: Ya aas paas ke area area me jyada karte hai all india karte hai ji.
Customer: Ha waise to jyada hota hai hamara haryana punjab aur rajasthan.
Executive: Hanji.
Customer: Teen teen jyada hai.
Executive: Ji samajh gaye samajh gaye sir aur hum jo door frame hote hai jaise GI door frame ho gaya ya wooden wooden door frame me bhi deal karte hai sir hum.
Customer: Nahi wooden me nahi karte GI wooden me nahi karte na.
Executive: GI me deal karte hai aur dusre wala sir.
Customer: Ek PG aati hai aur tata galvan.
Executive: Ji ji ji ji ji ji aur sir isme hamari kitni order value kitni sir 20000 25000 se upar ki order value rehni chahiye hamari.
Customer: Wo to area pe depend hai agar nazdeek kam se kam 50000 ki hoti hoti hai hamari minimum hi hota hai.
Executive: Kam se kam 50000 ki hoti hi hoti hai.
Customer: Ha
Executive: Ji ji ji matlab area pe bhi depend karta hai ki aas paas ka rahega to 50000 uske haji haji haji uske dur jata jayega to wo upar badhte hi jayega ji sir samajh gaya.
Customer: Ji ji ji
Executive: To sir mai na aapko isi number pe aapke bhej diya karunga aur sir mai na ye puch raha tha jaise abhi ko humne kuch consume hi kar rakhi to hamara koi pattern isme bana nahi hua to hum pe inquiry bhi kam aa rahi hai aur calls bhi kafi kam aa rahi hai to iske liye na sir ye pattern generate hone me hamare ko teen se char din lagenge aur mai na aapko aisa hi karunga jaise ek hamare ko ye hai ki isme sir hum GST verified wale me aapko matlab jinka jo verified customer rahenge na isme hamare by leads me jo verified by leads hongi mai wo wali aapko bhejunga jo GST verified rahegi usse kya rahega na hamara pattern isme usi hisab se generate ho jayega ki hamare ko dealing itni chahiye aur wo reh sake mai na sir aapko aaj kuch bhejunga aur kal matlab aaj mai kuch bhejunga aap unko dekh ke bataiyega ki wo wali hamare se relevant aapko lagi matlab jo mai aapko bhej raha hu wo relevant hai ya nahi kyuki uske hisab se hi sir fir mai aapko aage bheja karunga by leads kyuki abhi na hamara bilkul bhi koi pattern jo hai wo generate nahi ho rakha hai sir achcha isi wajah se aur sir hamari catalog pe bhi kam karna hai baki pehle aapko agar yaha se mai aapko by leads bhejta hu aap pehle active ho jaiye uske baad hum catalog pe kam kar lenge sir wo to koi aisa issue nahi hai theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai ok thank you so much sir.
Customer: Hello phone to bada chhod diya.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving calls and orders.

- Wants number to be added to receive calls.

- Account manager keeps changing.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed number is added.

- Explained number is only active during office hours.

- Executive will share relevant buyleads on WhatsApp.

- Will send GST verified leads.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send buyleads to customer.

- Customer will review and provide feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, account manager, gst, order value
